ï»¿STAT JTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, Internatior al Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee under Section 4(iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Loan (7hejiang Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Project) to the People's Republic of Chin a. The undersigned Commil tee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Bank 'or Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4(iii, of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal ihat the Bank grant to the People's Repub ic of China (the Borrower), a loan in an amount of two hundred million United States Dollars (US$ 200,000,000). The purpose of said loan is to improve access to sustainable water supply and sE nitation services in selected villages and towns in rural areas of the Borrower's Zhejiang Province 1. The Committee has carefi illy studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purpose to which the procec ds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of tht opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be .pplied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of A ;reement, and that said project is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of the People's Republic of China and is in the interest of the People's Republic of China and of the members of the Bank as a whole.
ï»¿-2- (People's Republic of China) (Zhejiang Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Project) 3. Accordingly, the Commil tee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance. COMMITTEE ' Senior Vice Pesident and Group General Counsel Expert Selected by Governor for the People's Republic of China Regional Vice President East Asia and Pacific Region Dated at Washington, D.C.
